name: Core Fault
summary: Control a remote operated mining droid to mine the planet's most valuable resource: Cores. But, beware - the inhabitants don't take too lightly to their home being excavated. Use crank operated movement to weave around enemies, collect Cores, and dig deeper into the fault.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Making a Vampire Survivors-like Game for the Playdate (ft. davemakes)
